name: Special Clearances
text: At the start of a player's turn, ou may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to allow that player to choose any number of laws in play. Those laws are treated as blank until the end of that player's turn.

name: Guild Fund
text:
After you resolve the primary ability of a strategy card, you may resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card.
When you would spend a command token, you may exhaust this card to spend 1 token from your reinforcements instead.

name: Special Forces
text: At the start of a space combat in which you are the defender: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 command token from your strategy pool to force your opponent to declare a retreat.
